property.name: mediadisplayblurb
property.value: Pakistani interpreter speaking with female service members

note.text: No matter how professional and skilled your interpreter is, working with an interpreter always increases the potential for misunderstanding. Your interpreter inevitably acts as a filter between you and your audience.

There are some useful parallels between how you should speak using a radio and how you should speak when working with an interpreter. Both interpreters and radios increase your communication possibilities, but they also introduce the possibility of distortion.
